history.proof: intros. induction ll. - simpl. constructor. - simpl. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros X P f ll H.
intros X' P f ll H.
intros X' P' f ll H.
intros X' P' f' ll H.
intros X' P' f' ll' H.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros X P f ll H. induction ll. - simpl. constructor. - simpl. destruct H as [H1 H2]. destruct (f a) eqn:F. + constructor. * apply H1. * apply IHll. apply H2. + apply IHll. apply H2.
